title: The Supply Chain, Semiconductors, And Real Estate
itunes:title: The Supply Chain, Semiconductors, And Real Estate
description:
Sampath Sowmyanarayan, Chief Revenue Officer at Verizon, discusses the supply chain, 5G, and helping lead Verizon through pandemic. Nakul Duggal, Senior Vice President and General Manager of Automotive at Qualcomm, discusses the supply chain, semiconductors, and future of driving. Bonnie Stone Sellers, co-Founder and Chair at Forbes Global Properties, talks about the latest trends in luxury real estate. Sonali Basak, Bloomberg Wall Street reporter, has the latest on Goldman Sachs and its push to expand its credit card initiative in its consumer business. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
